title: Butte police seek information on missing man 21 hours ago
content: MISSOULA, Mont. —   Butte law enforcement officers want help finding this man. They just put Stanford King's photo on the department's Facebook page.    He's been on the run from the Butte prerelease center since 2016.    King was doing time for theft, drugs and assaulting a peace officer.    If you know anything call 406-497-1151.
